info.description: The [Swagger Playground](https://developers.strava.com/playground) is the easiest way to familiarize yourself with the Strava API by submitting HTTP requests and observing the responses before you write any client code. It will show what a response will look like with different endpoints depending on the authorization scope you receive from your athletes. To use the Playground, go to https://www.strava.com/settings/api and change your “Authorization Callback Domain” to developers.strava.com. Please note, we only support Swagger 2.0. There is a known issue where you can only select one scope at a time. For more information, please check the section “client code” at https://developers.strava.com/docs.
info.title: Strava API v3

post.description: Creates a manual activity for an athlete, requires activity:write scope.

parameters.description: Type of activity. For example - Run, Ride etc.
parameters.name: type

parameters.description: Sport type of activity. For example - Run, MountainBikeRide, Ride, etc.
parameters.name: sport_type

parameters.description: Set to 1 to mark as a trainer activity.
parameters.name: trainer

parameters.description: Set to 1 to mark as commute.
parameters.name: commute

get.description: Returns the given activity that is owned by the authenticated athlete. Requires activity:read for Everyone and Followers activities. Requires activity:read_all for Only Me activities.

put.description: Updates the given activity that is owned by the authenticated athlete. Requires activity:write. Also requires activity:read_all in order to update Only Me activities

get.description: Returns the comments on the given activity. Requires activity:read for Everyone and Followers activities. Requires activity:read_all for Only Me activities.

parameters.description: Number of items per page. Defaults to 30.
parameters.name: page_size

parameters.description: Cursor of the last item in the previous page of results, used to request the subsequent page of results.  When omitted, the first page of results is fetched.
parameters.name: after_cursor

application/json.text: Good job and keep the cat pictures coming!

get.description: Returns the athletes who kudoed an activity identified by an identifier. Requires activity:read for Everyone and Followers activities. Requires activity:read_all for Only Me activities.

parameters.description: Number of items per page. Defaults to 30.
parameters.name: per_page

get.description: Returns the laps of an activity identified by an identifier. Requires activity:read for Everyone and Followers activities. Requires activity:read_all for Only Me activities.
Returns the given activity's streams. Requires activity:read scope. Requires activity:read_all scope for Only Me activities.
Summit Feature. Returns the zones of a given activity. Requires activity:read for Everyone and Followers activities. Requires activity:read_all for Only Me activities.
Returns the currently authenticated athlete. Tokens with profile:read_all scope will receive a detailed athlete representation; all others will receive a summary representation.

200.description: Profile information for the authenticated athlete.

put.description: Update the currently authenticated athlete. Requires profile:write scope.

parameters.description: The weight of the athlete in kilograms.
parameters.name: weight

200.description: Profile information for the authenticated athlete.

get.description: Returns the activities of an athlete for a specific identifier. Requires activity:read. Only Me activities will be filtered out unless requested by a token with activity:read_all.

parameters.description: An epoch timestamp to use for filtering activities that have taken place before a certain time.
parameters.name: before

parameters.description: An epoch timestamp to use for filtering activities that have taken place after a certain time.
parameters.name: after

parameters.description: Number of items per page. Defaults to 30.
parameters.name: per_page

get.description: Returns a list of the clubs whose membership includes the authenticated athlete.

parameters.description: Number of items per page. Defaults to 30.
parameters.name: per_page

200.description: A list of summary club representations.

get.description: Returns the the authenticated athlete's heart rate and power zones. Requires profile:read_all.
Returns a list of the routes created by the authenticated athlete. Private routes are filtered out unless requested by a token with read_all scope.

parameters.description: Number of items per page. Defaults to 30.
parameters.name: per_page

get.description: Returns the activity stats of an athlete. Only includes data from activities set to Everyone visibilty.

parameters.description: The identifier of the athlete. Must match the authenticated athlete.
parameters.name: id

get.description: Returns a given a club using its identifier.

200.description: The detailed representation of a club.

application/json.description: Private club for Cyclists who work at Strava.
application/json.name: Team Strava Cycling

get.description: Retrieve recent activities from members of a specific club. The authenticated athlete must belong to the requested club in order to hit this endpoint. Pagination is supported. Athlete profile visibility is respected for all activities.

parameters.description: Number of items per page. Defaults to 30.
parameters.name: per_page

get.description: Returns a list of the administrators of a given club.

parameters.description: Number of items per page. Defaults to 30.
parameters.name: per_page

200.description: A list of summary athlete representations.

get.description: Returns a list of the athletes who are members of a given club.

parameters.description: Number of items per page. Defaults to 30.
parameters.name: per_page

200.description: A list of club athlete representations.

get.description: Returns an equipment using its identifier.
Returns a route using its identifier. Requires read_all scope for private routes.
Returns a GPX file of the route. Requires read_all scope for private routes.

200.description: A GPX file with the route.

get.description: Returns a TCX file of the route. Requires read_all scope for private routes.

200.description: A TCX file with the route.

get.description: Returns the given route's streams. Requires read_all scope for private routes.
Returns a set of the authenticated athlete's segment efforts for a given segment.  Requires subscription.

parameters.description: Number of items per page. Defaults to 30.
parameters.name: per_page

get.description: Returns a segment effort from an activity that is owned by the authenticated athlete. Requires subscription.

parameters.description: The identifier of the segment effort.
parameters.name: id

get.description: Returns a set of streams for a segment effort completed by the authenticated athlete. Requires read_all scope.

parameters.description: The identifier of the segment effort.
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: The types of streams to return.
parameters.name: keys

get.description: Returns the top 10 segments matching a specified query.

parameters.description: The latitude and longitude for two points describing a rectangular boundary for the search: [southwest corner latitutde, southwest corner longitude, northeast corner latitude, northeast corner longitude]
parameters.name: bounds

get.description: List of the authenticated athlete's starred segments. Private segments are filtered out unless requested by a token with read_all scope.

parameters.description: Number of items per page. Defaults to 30.
parameters.name: per_page

200.description: List of the authenticated athlete's starred segments.

get.description: Returns the specified segment. read_all scope required in order to retrieve athlete-specific segment information, or to retrieve private segments.

put.description: Stars/Unstars the given segment for the authenticated athlete. Requires profile:write scope.

parameters.description: The identifier of the segment to star.
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: If true, star the segment; if false, unstar the segment.
parameters.name: starred

get.description: Returns the given segment's streams. Requires read_all scope for private segments.

parameters.description: The types of streams to return.
parameters.name: keys

post.description: Uploads a new data file to create an activity from. Requires activity:write scope.

parameters.description: The desired name of the resulting activity.
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: The desired description of the resulting activity.
parameters.name: description

parameters.description: Whether the resulting activity should be marked as having been performed on a trainer.
parameters.name: trainer

parameters.description: Whether the resulting activity should be tagged as a commute.
parameters.name: commute

parameters.description: The format of the uploaded file.
parameters.name: data_type

parameters.description: The desired external identifier of the resulting activity.
parameters.name: external_id

201.description: A representation of the created upload.

get.description: Returns an upload for a given identifier. Requires activity:write scope.

activityStats.description: A set of rolled-up statistics and totals for an athlete

biggest_climb_elevation_gain.description: The highest climb ridden by the athlete.

biggest_ride_distance.description: The longest distance ridden by the athlete.

activityTotal.description: A roll-up of metrics pertaining to a set of activities. Values are in seconds and meters.

achievement_count.description: The total number of achievements of the considered activities.

count.description: The number of activities considered in this total.

distance.description: The total distance covered by the considered activities.

elapsed_time.description: The total elapsed time of the considered activities.

elevation_gain.description: The total elevation gain of the considered activities.

moving_time.description: The total moving time of the considered activities.

activityType.description: An enumeration of the types an activity may have. Note that this enumeration does not include new sport types (e.g. MountainBikeRide, EMountainBikeRide), activities with these sport types will have the corresponding activity type (e.g. Ride for MountainBikeRide, EBikeRide for EMountainBikeRide)

data.description: The sequence of altitude values for this stream, in meters

original_size.description: The number of data points in this stream

resolution.description: The level of detail (sampling) in which this stream was returned

series_type.description: The base series used in the case the stream was downsampled

data.description: The sequence of cadence values for this stream, in rotations per minute

elapsed_time.description: The activity's elapsed time, in seconds

moving_time.description: The activity's moving time, in seconds

admin.description: Whether the athlete is a club admin.

owner.description: Whether the athlete is club owner.

resource_state.description: Resource state, indicates level of detail. Possible values: 1 -> "meta", 2 -> "summary", 3 -> "detail"

activity_id.description: The identifier of the activity this comment is related to

created_at.description: The time at which this comment was created.

id.description: The unique identifier of this comment

created_at.description: The time at which the athlete was created.

profile.description: URL to a 124x124 pixel profile picture.

profile_medium.description: URL to a 62x62 pixel profile picture.

resource_state.description: Resource state, indicates level of detail. Possible values: 1 -> "meta", 2 -> "summary", 3 -> "detail"

state.description: The athlete's state or geographical region.

summit.description: Whether the athlete has any Summit subscription.

updated_at.description: The time at which the athlete was last updated.

achievement_count.description: The number of achievements gained during this activity

athlete_count.description: The number of athletes for taking part in a group activity

average_speed.description: The activity's average speed, in meters per second

average_watts.description: Average power output in watts during this activity. Rides only

elev_high.description: The activity's highest elevation, in meters

elev_low.description: The activity's lowest elevation, in meters

scopes.activity:read: Read the user's activity data for activities that are visible to Everyone and Followers, excluding privacy zone data
scopes.activity:read_all: The same access as activity:read, plus privacy zone data and access to read the user's activities with visibility set to Only You
scopes.activity:write: Access to create manual activities and uploads, and access to edit any activities that are visible to the app, based on activity read access level
scopes.profile:read_all: Read all profile information even if the user has set their profile visibility to Followers or Only You
scopes.profile:write: Update the user's weight and Functional Threshold Power (FTP), and access to star or unstar segments on their behalf
scopes.read: Read public segments, public routes, public profile data, public posts, public events, club feeds, and leaderboards
scopes.read_all: Read private routes, private segments, and private events for the user
